name: Onoway
description:
The power to freeze time is not something provided free of sacrifice. Prove yourself in the trials of the Onoway.

Onoway is a puzzle platformer where you can stop time.

Made for the Mini Jam 112: Chrono.

[Controls]
  • Move: Left / Right
  • Stop time: [Z]
  • Hold [Z] to pause.
[Credits]

Game design, programming, music and art by Nokutoka Momiji.
